title: mangaLam shrI rAmunaku
sahitya:
mangaLam shrI rAmunaku shubha mangalamakunipuDu


anupallavi

  rangumIra sItatOnu velayucu pAnguni pAdAra vindamulaku


caraNam 1    ragukula tiLakuniki rAjIvAkSuniki ramaNIya vESadhAriki 
aghanAshanuTaku amara vandituniki ayOdhyApuri nilayunikipuDu
    caraNam 2    bhakta kOTla-kabhayamiccu vAniki bharatAgrEsaruDaina vAniki 
bhukti muktula kAdAriyai bhuvanatrayamulu pAlincu vAniki
    caraNam 3    vEda shAstra purANAgamyuniki vishvambaruDai velayu vAniki 
sAdaruDaina sadAshiva nutuniki sankaTamellanu dIrccu vAniki
